name: Varram
resist: one of the following: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, poison

trait.name: 5etools Note
text: Varram is presented in The Rise of Tiamat as a male dwarf. The dragonsoul statblock, modified with dwarf racial traits, has been provided here for ease of use.

trait.name: Dragon Fanatic
text: Varram has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While Varram can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, Varram ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Fanatic Advantage
text: Once per turn, if Varram makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

trait.name: Limited Flight
text: Varram can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: Varram has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of Varram's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Varram attacks twice with its shortsword.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) damage of the type to which Varram has resistance.

action.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (3/Day)
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 27 (6d8) damage of the type to which Varram has damage resistance.
